title: Footprints on the Mountains
creator_credit: Denise Mack, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: At age 11 Denise Mack is told secretly by her mother that her heritage isn’t Irish, that her grandfather was Lebanese and her grandmother, Chinese. Through this story, Denise journeys along the path of her ancestry to bring her closer to herself.
creator_credit_for_label: Denise Mack, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
